title: Void -Dementia-
description:
I don’t know why she’s here or what she did hereYou must find the piece of memory and find out what this place is and what she is. Every action in the game is a way for her to bring her memories back. When she fights enemies and defeats bosses, she can bring back memories of the past. A weapon master who can freely use three types of weapons: katana, dual blade, and greatsword. Blood Trail
She is the best swordsman who can freely switch weapons against her enemies at any time. If you can find her lost memories, you will be able to use even powerful skills. The Void Realm rejects her and threatens her. But she is immortal.The five bosses, beyond human power, prevent her from leaving the void realm.
